name: Squared Out
description:
A Muiltiplayer 1 V 1 Game where you capture zones to spawn in objects to fling at your opponents

CONTROLS

PRESS LEFTMOUSEBUTTON TO CONTROL YOUR MINIONS

PRESS SPACE TO CALL MINIONS TO YOU

WASD TO MOVE

HOW TO PLAY

2 players start at either end, go to the food zones to capture them, once captured, the zones will start spawning minions which you will need to fling around and hit your opponent with.

UPDATES

Comment below if you want me to update the game, what you would like to see added, I'm trying my best to get into game making, I want to add in maps, and a shop to upgrade your minions, and add in varients of minions, but comment if you would like to see this concept of a game be put into a more refined game

There are a few bugs such as you may need to restart the game when finished playing to play another game, but please comment below if you find any more bugs and I will try to fix them
